segments.text: Don't you ever cheat on me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some men do , but not me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm an open book . Watch me all you want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I catch you , you'll be sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You won't catch me , because I love you . I'm not a cheater .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will poke your eyes out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't want any other woman .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will chop your toes off , one by one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Honey , please . You're the only woman for me , forever . I swear it .
segments.speaker: S2
